subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Martin Kaymer, who won the P.G.A. Championship in August, closed with a six-under-par 66 at St. Andrews on Sunday to win the Dunhill Links Championship.
snippet: Martin Kaymer, who won the P.G.A. Championship in August, closed with a six-under-par 66 at St. Andrews on Sunday to win the Dunhill Links Championship.
